title: Application Opens
description: Are you interested in running for a position? Not sure where to start? We encourage any interested student to pursue a leadership positions on the ASI Board of Directors and Cal State LA Academic Senate by filing the application by the required deadline.

title: Own It! Info Session I
description: Need to know more? Join us for an “Own it” info session and find out how you can Own it in 2026–2027. Gain leadership experience, be the voice for students, and help with essential campus changes.

title: Own It! Info Session II
description: If you missed the previous session, join this one! Find out how you can Own it in 2026–2027. Network, gain leadership experience, and be the voice for students, helping with essential campus changes.

title: Own It! Info Session III
description: Another chance to learn how you can Own it in 2026–2027. Network, gain leadership experience, and be the voice for students, helping with essential campus changes.

title: Application Deadline
description: Please complete your application by this date.

title: Candidate Campaign Week
description: Meet the candidates representing you at Cal State LA. Discover their ideas, ask questions, and learn about their passions for our community. Find the best representative for your student voice.

title: Voting Week
description: Your Voice, Your Vote! Vote online for your student representatives through the Cal State LA GET System. Check your Cal State LA email for more details.

title: Voting Day 1 - In-N-Out
description: Bite the Vote! Help shape the future of your campus by voting for your student representatives. Enjoy music, food, and a lively atmosphere while you make your voice heard. Food will be available while supplies last! Don’t miss out!

title: Voting Day 2 - Goodie Bags
description: Missed your chance to vote yesterday? There’s still time! Cast your ballot for your student representatives and pick up a free goodie bag while supplies last. Stop by and make your vote count!

title: Election Results Announcement
description: Join us for our election announcement. Come meet your new representatives for the 2026 to 2027 academic year!
